item.title: We still have Firefox userChrome JS script in the 2020s (introduction, tutorial, resources)
item.description:
Today ( 2022 update ) Firefox's userChrome script (uc script, for short) can still be used. We cannot know whether Mozilla will completely kill the uc script in a far or near future. People have been fearing about that in the past two years, but since 57, it is the uc script that make some people (such as me) don’t have (or temporarily not) give up Firefox to switch to another browser.

Read More
